description: The height of a cell, as measured by the number of pixels that separates the bottom most and top most pixel in the segmented image converted to units of µm.
tooltip: The height of a cell, as measured by the number of pixels that separates the bottom most and top most pixel in the segmented image converted to units of µm.

description: The volume of a cell, as measured by segmented voxels and associated edge length, in units of µm³.
tooltip: The volume of a cell, as measured by segmented voxels and associated edge length, in units of µm³.

description: The surface area of a cell, as measured by segmented pixels and associated edge length, in units of µm².
tooltip: The surface area of a cell, as measured by segmented pixels and associated edge length, in units of µm².

description: The height of a nucleus, as measured by the number of pixels that separates the bottom most and top most pixel in the segmented image converted to units of µm.
tooltip: The height of a nucleus, as measured by the number of pixels that separates the bottom most and top most pixel in the segmented image converted to units of µm.

description: The volume of a nucleus of a given cell, as measured by segmented voxels and associated edge length, in units of µm³.
tooltip: The volume of a nucleus of a given cell, as measured by segmented voxels and associated edge length, in units of µm³.

description: The surface area of a cell, as measured by segmented pixels and associated edge length, in units of µm².
tooltip: The surface area of a cell, as measured by segmented pixels and associated edge length, in units of µm².

description: The volume of the fluorescently labeled structure of a given cell, as measured by segmented voxels and associated edge length, in units of µm³.
tooltip: The volume of the fluorescently labeled structure of a given cell, as measured by segmented voxels and associated edge length, in units of µm³.

description: Whether the segmentation contains the entirety of the cell boundary (only determined for cells in anaphase).
tooltip: Whether the segmentation contains the entirety of the cell boundary (only determined for cells in anaphase).

description: Whether a particular cell is currently in interphase or mitosis.
tooltip: Whether a particular cell is currently in interphase or mitosis.

description: Which of our 5 stages of the cell cycle (determined by the shape of the DNA) a particular cell is currently in.
tooltip: Which of our 5 stages of the cell cycle (determined by the shape of the DNA) a particular cell is currently in.
